DOC.brief_summary: Does consumption various combination mono disaccharide ( lactose , sucrose fructose ) protein isolates ( whey soy ) result alter substrate absorption , substrate oxidation , glucose regulation ? This propose research provide data determine relative contribution source protein ( whey vs soy ) carbohydrate ( mono- disaccharide ) observe effect dairy product absorption , substrate oxidation glucoregulation mechanism affect body composition .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Lactose , Fructose , Sucrose , Whey Protein , Soy Protein Substrate Absorption Oxidation : Pilot Study
DOC.detailed_description: Epidemiological research show dairy product aid weight loss weight maintenance . Some evidence suggest effect due whey component ( contain whey protein lactose ) milk . Previous work laboratory demonstrate chronic administration whey protein concentrate result decrease body fat insulin concentration . Recent research ( unpublished ) Castonguay colleague ( University Maryland , College Park , MD ) suggest specific combination sucrose , maltose lactose similarly alter body fat level rat . This propose research provide data determine relative contribution source protein ( whey vs soy ) carbohydrate ( mono- disaccharide ) observe effect dairy product absorption , substrate oxidation glucoregulation mechanism affect body composition .
DOC.criteria: Male . BMI least 20 less 38 kg/m2 body weight < 300 lb . Age 25 65 year begin study . Fasting glucose < 126 mg/dL . Blood pressure < 160/100 mm Hg . Total plasma cholesterol < 280 mg/dL . Nonsmokers tobacco user ( least 6 month prior start study . ) History presence kidney disease , liver disease , gout , certain cancer , thyroid disease , gastrointestinal , metabolic disease , malabsorption syndrome . Type 2 diabetes require use oral antidiabetic agent insulin . History eat disorder . Volunteers routinely participate heavy exercise volunteer initiate exercise program study . Volunteers lose 10 % body weight within last 12 month . Volunteers Atkins , South Beach similar diet 3 month prior start study . Use prescription overthecounter antiobesity medication supplement ( e.g. , phenylpropanalamine , ephedrine , caffeine , least 6 month prior start study ) . Known ( selfreported ) allergy adverse reaction dairy product ( include lactose ) soy . Volunteers consume whey soy protein supplement .
